website_summaries.verdict: A tough RC truck at a mid-range price. Power and performance are reliable in numerous conditions.
pros: Can withstand rain and other inclement weather
Shockproof system allows it to withstand uneven surfaces and bumpy terrain
Has thick tires and a wide wheel base
Capable of speeds to about 23 mph
cons: The range is a little more limited than some competitors

customer_reviews.title: Maybe the third time will be a charm!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry but i need to add to my review of this product. And again i have to return yet another rc truck.my grandchild ran the truck approximately 1 hour and 15 minutes left is after running down both batteries recharging them running them down again...and i tried running his truck ran it up the street about 5house lengths and started back and halfway back it just stopped and would not move motor worked but it didn't move. I do not understand what's going on with these trucks but I'm really unhappy. Please remember you asked for the review and to be honest I apologize if it affects you but you have to know
customer_reviews.author: michael shaun chapman

customer_reviews.title: Very fast
customer_reviews.text: Well made and quite fast. However, we are very tired of having to remove the tiny, tiny little cotter pins to remove the body shell, in order to get to the inner frame, in order to open up the battery compartment, in order to turn off the power. Perhaps they could re-think ways to access the switch. My kids can't seem to be able to get the little pins out without pliers and there were no extra pins included. I'm sure we'll end up losing some and will have to fabricate something to replace them. Battery goes down pretty fast, so you're constantly opening up the frame to switch them out.
customer_reviews.author: L. Maffett

customer_reviews.title: Fun RC truck
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't had a RC car since I was a kid. I played with this thing a lot and hard. It lasted several months of hard driving before the motor burned out and it became undriveable. If you took better care and didn't let very young children who crash it into everything try it, this truck would last a long time. It works great on asphalt and cement. It'll go great on grass, as long as it's not too long. Dirt and gravel are no problem either.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Good truck but with less than  perfect shell
customer_reviews.text: The plastic on the truck body is the most fragile plastic ever. You won't be able to pack this in a suitcase as it will be crushed UPDATE: customer service got back to me and was very responsive as such I've increased the review rating. The truck works and my 5 year old son liked it. It's just a bit unfortunate about the shell.. I'd also recommend that the design be updated to put the on/off switch outside the battery compartment so you don't have to remove the shell in order to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: K. Boyce

customer_reviews.title: Broke after two uses. They sent a new one
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it twice and already won't go in reverse. I didn't crash it or anything. Horrible product. Do not buy. I just tried to return it and get a refund but it says you have to print out postage tags. I don't own a printer so I guess I'll just keep this broken car and look at it. They sent me a new one and it seems to work fine so far. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: jro

customer_reviews.title: This company is highly customer based & has a quality mission statement like no other ..
customer_reviews.text: Switching the Car on or off requires the removal of the body as well as charging of the battery not well thought out for end user a lot of hassle just to turn it on or off. However this 1/12 scale truck runs great as advertised. This company has assured me that they are looking to fixing this inconvenience, a highly customer base company who cares about their end users. I give them a big five star rating for their quality mission statement of customer satisfaction. Simply put Awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: mitchell egle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This truck is awesome! I bought for my 10 year old son. I want one now too! Good grippy rubber tires, but has plenty of power to spin them and do donuts. Steering is great. Body is pretty well bulit but it is plastic so if you hit some thing at 30mph you can break it. Control is pretty good. A little hard to get to topspeed for my son because you need precise speed control or it looses traction which makes it great for novice and a good challenge for dad.Had a problem with it at first, it wanted to drive forward slow by itself but after 2 minutes the control balanced itself out, No issues to date.
customer_reviews.author: Liquidlighting

customer_reviews.title: quite happy with this little guy
customer_reviews.text: quite happy with this little guy. my kid is going to go crazy for it. it's fast and fun. just perfect to start out with. stock up on jb weld though because things will break but easy to fix and worth fixing. update day 3: transmission gears stripped. ordered parts from china. 15-30 day wait.. i expidited to 2-4day shipping for 15$ stripped out way too fast.still a great car if you have a lot of time on your hands and can wait for snail mail. still cool car and repairable. only 4 star, because it was a lot of fun before it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Darla Burton

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level car.
customer_reviews.text: This RC car is not hobbie grade in the aspect of swappable motors, shocks and so on. But when a part breaks you can easily order and repair it. Very basic hobbie grade. Really affordable step before a $175 hobbie RC car. It is fast and very fun. Battery at full charge last a good while. Buy an extra battery and you have a good 45 mins of fun.
customer_reviews.author: CodMurr

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this thing!!! I bought one a couple years ago, and other than the transmission melting because I overused it...I bought 3 batteries and often ran right thru them which really shouldnt be done LoL...the engine and transmission need time to cool between batteries...its not a difficult repair and Hossim provided me with 2 sets of gears when I brought it their attention the 1st time...SUPER FAST, SUPER LIGHT & SUPER FUN !!!
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Could be better...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these. Like other reviewers have stated....battery drains quickly. For us, between 12-15 minutes of use. Purchased second battery for each car which holds a charge better (about 20 minutes). Actually, one battery was a total dud and Amazon refunded the $13.88 and I purchased another "back-up" that does work better than the other car's original battery. Kids have fun and it is very fast. They use it without the truck plastic top as it's hard to take on and off with all the battery changes!! Lol. Expensive toy and I think it should work better for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty shoddy nylon plastic
customer_reviews.text: ***Update*** Since I have contacted the seller and explained to them what happened. They promptly sent me a new car and expressed their deepest condolences. I was actually pleasantly surprised by the high level of customer service. So thanks for the new car! Broke the first day we had it, right where the front suspension connects to the body. Pretty shoddy nylon plastic. It only crashed into the curb by nice, you would think it would be a little more heavy duty. So now I have buy my child another one...
customer_reviews.author: Paul Pelletier

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 5 mins. DISAPPOINTING - Full Refund
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 12 year old son for Christmas. Had it for less than 5 minute and it’s already broken. It’s made with cheap plastic. Very fast and was fun for the fews minutes we had it but what a DISAPPOINTMENT. I contacted the company and they gave me a full refund. Happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Barbie got a new car!
customer_reviews.text: I love the car. I need to measure how long drive it gives me but it feels like far more than just 10 minutes. Changing batteries and turning the car on and off is a bit cumbersome as you need to remove the chassis but guess what... I am not using the chassis! Instead I installed my GoPro and Barbie and they work splendidly together. The car is very stable even in higher speed and easy to control with the ability to softly finger the throttle.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this car for my sons birthday. Originally we had an issue with the car but they made sure to make it right and offered a replacement. We have not had any issues since. We appreciate the willingness to make things right and the prompt attention to the matter. They sincerely want their customers to be happy. This is a great car. It's pretty fast so maybe not for younger kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: partially because I've expired the truly remarkable consumer services and partially because this really is a great toy and I've
customer_reviews.text: Have changed my mind and added a star, partially because I've expired the truly remarkable consumer services and partially because this really is a great toy and I've none of the problems that have shone up in other revues. (But I still wish they provided a longer lasting battery without charging, and I would-happily pay more to get one).
customer_reviews.author: Frank Martino

customer_reviews.title: Fast Truck!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing to update my previous rating. Let me start by saying this truck is awesome!!! The only reason I'm giving it a 4 instead of 5 is the battery doesn't last long at all. I understand a truck that goes this fast and capable of driving on/off road uses a lot of energy. Nothing that can really be done short of sacrificing performance. My son is so excited, and I am probably going to buy another so we can race. Got to admit I'm getting as much enjoyment out of it as he is. I would recommend buying an extra battery and charger, as I am going to do.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works...
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about 1/2 day then the gears in the motor started to break. A couple of teeth of the gears broke causing the car to not work properly. They need to get that fixed. Works well when it works but some of the cheaper plastic gears loose their teeth and you are hosed. Not sure if the teeth break from the high speed nut they didn't seem to last from our experience. Maybe I got a lemon?!?!
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is super fast and fun
customer_reviews.text: This thing is super fast and fun. Its durability is a bit questionable when it comes to the exterior pieces. Butt the company has great customer service and sent replacement pieces out to me immediately. I have also purchased some extra parts myself since we had that thing for more than 30 days. Would recommend purchasing extra bumper brackets with the truck to save you some time. Think I'll be getting one for myself so I can have fun with my son.
customer_reviews.author: I Zon Alot

customer_reviews.title: Car is amazing, my son loved it and it really is ...
customer_reviews.text: Car is amazing, my son loved it and it really is powerful and fast. Customer Service was great as well, I had an issue where something got stuck in the motor and so vendor sent me a whole new car free of charge because of the circumstance. That being said I had the same issue again on the second one so durability and toughness is an issue with this item. Ultimately paid about $70 for 3 weeks of play time :*(
customer_reviews.author: Junaidullah khan

customer_reviews.title: Fast car and very fun. My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Fast car and very fun. My son loves it. Although if it hits a rock it starts doing donuts until you let off throttle. Note: the first day he used it on Christmas, the power switch is now stuck in the on position. Kinda shoddy in my opinion. But overall decent rc car. Update: Hoisim has reached out to me to resolve the issue I have stated above. Very good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: K. Stoner

customer_reviews.title: nice gem of a rc truck
customer_reviews.text: Nice and a gem of a rc truck, I was able to take the battery out and with out remove truck body, very easy and very little effort. I sudjest mid jumps with model and have it land in soft ground and grassy area to cushion the landings. This great truck. The problem is shipping need better and more dependable shipping method and item needs gear oil.
customer_reviews.author: william m.

customer_reviews.title: Not IPX 5 :(
customer_reviews.text: 12/27 My kid loves it. But I opened it and all the paper work reads IPX 4 not 5 like the description reads. Its fast enough for beginners. I have also have the red one which seems to be the same. !/24 Update: Emily @ customer service was great!!! BTW So far the truck works great. We've had it in the baseball field, pavement, school blacktop, and school track and field area. No mud puddles:(
customer_reviews.author: alli gator dad

customer_reviews.title: Chasing The Geese Away!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband because he needed a device to chase the geese away from our property. This car does the trick. A few laps around the edge of our property and the geese are in the water or on the other side of our pond and off of our lawn! It’s awesome!
customer_reviews.author: That’s my Patty!

customer_reviews.title: The worst
customer_reviews.text: Terrible terrible terrible. First time driving and it broke. Do not buy this unless you have a long stretch of pavement where there are no bumps or anything it can bump into or flip over on. Return window is short so hurry and send it back if you’ve ordered it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela E.

customer_reviews.title: 3 drives and the battery wouldn’t charge
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box it was great! Then the battery wouldn’t charge after 4 cycles. 10 minutes max of run time. Takes 3hours to charge... Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Magyver

customer_reviews.title: Hosim contacted me and offered to send me a replacement battery right away. I was very impressed with their customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson and it ran great the first time. After first battery charge it didn't work any longer. I purchase 2 additional batteries 1 of which didn't work either after first charge and the other is still working after over 10 charges? The quality of the vehicle itself is excellent but if 1 out of 3 batteries are defective it only provides me something to expensive to keep running. Looks good on the shelf though :)
customer_reviews.author: David McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Fast Fast Fast
customer_reviews.text: Sweet ride, wicked fast, good range for a cheap price. I was a bit disappointed cause the box had been previously opened and the body seems to be used everything else was brand new. The body had some wear on it like some had one and needed a new body so they switched it. Other than that it's awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Y2N8

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for price of RC Truck
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old and I really enjoy this truck. It is fast and durable. I am pretty rough on most items and this truck endures interaction with me. Where I am things break and this truck has held up. The range the truck can be controlled in with the controller, speed, and durability are a great surprise. Added a go pro to the body and the additional weight helps the tires stick to the ground even more and the handling is even better with the attached go pro.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Truck Battery not so great.
customer_reviews.text: Great little truck! Super fast, great power and looks great! Cappy thing is the battery quit taking charge after 4th recharge, don't know the cause and haven't priced one yet so we're sitting idle. :(
customer_reviews.author: Cfuson

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable expectations
customer_reviews.text: The truck was 72.00 and many of the parts keep breaking. Pretty typical with plastic toys. Replaced some broken parts, then the wheel broke off after only playing with it 3 times total. Spoke with the seller and they took care of the issues.
customer_reviews.author: be-you-tiful

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: This car has been a blast. We drive it hard (not reckless or out of control) and it's done it's share of accidental end-over-end tumbles and it still works. For this price we're super happy. The rating system on Amazon helped us find this car and it's a gem. I don't predict it will last forever but I think we've got our "money's worth" as they say.
customer_reviews.author: MusicGuy

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money —- don’t buy !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could rate this at negative status I would , the car sticks and runs full force, the screw to open remote to add battery’s was stripped , the actually skin of car doesn’t stay on — waste of money !
customer_reviews.author: Glm

customer_reviews.title: Use in Open Spaces, fast and fun
customer_reviews.text: Update: The seller stands behind their product. After speaking with them, they replaced the item after it broke. I recommend that anyone who purchases one of these RC Cars only use it in open spaces as it does not hold up well running into stationary objects. All and All, I am good with the product. Spent a little more money than usual on this truck. Unfortanely the plastic sway bar broke within the first 5 minutes of use. Really disappointing. Hoping it can be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent RC car!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good Rc Car fast and well worth the investment. received the item well packed and fast. I bought this for my 10years old brother but after receiving it i loved it so i decided to purchase two more. You can set up a little track and have even way more fun. RC is very strong. And don t forget buy more batteries because once you start playing with it you cannot stop. Seller has an excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: zulu akuna

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer response
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my son. Saved it for his birthday We drove it once and it broke. Something in the transmission or rear end. And nothing has been done to correct the problem. Don't buy this car
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Super fast - Controller is malfunctioning
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year-old son and husband love this RC car. The only problem is we are having issues with the controller. It will not respond to the car and the car is running out of control and we have no way of stopping it. Then suddenly, the controller will start to work again. Any suggestions of what we can do with this issue?
customer_reviews.author: B. Morello

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price range
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good product. It doesn't feel fragile or week. I was looking for something not too expensive and this was perfect. No complaints here. Just a suggestion 4 wheel drive would have been great. The 2wd is alright but it's not stable when you punch the throttle from dead stop. It spins out like crazy. Excellent product for the price range.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play with, Works as the description says. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple month ago. It's great does what the description says and is real fun to play with. The charger burnt when put the battery on charge (5th or 6th charge from a completely discharge battery). I was promptly provided with a new charger and a battery on reporting the same. It's up and running again. And goes really fast.
customer_reviews.author: Aarsh

customer_reviews.title: Battery life bad
customer_reviews.text: I must have a defective unit because the battery only lasts for 2-3 minutes. [2016-jul-15 update] Contacted Hosim and they gave me coupon code for new battery. Will test when arrives and update. [2016-jul-21 update] I purchased a new battery and my son can finally play with the truck. Though the battery only gets approx 10-15mins of runtime, it's still a vast improvement over the one which came with the truck. The truck is faaast and a ton of fun for my son. I will be purchasing yet another battery to extend his play time and I know he'll use it all summer long.
customer_reviews.author: Godwin P.

customer_reviews.title: Fast great toy my 12 year old
customer_reviews.text: This remote car is really fast my 12 year old loves it and plays with ut all the time. Had a little issue but three company took care of it beautifully and he's really enjoying it. U was actually surprised at the speed and accuracy of this car. Worth the money...
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: He is so happy that I almost bought another one with a different ...
customer_reviews.text: My grant son is crazy about this. He is so happy that I almost bought another one with a different color. He love this new car and will not let anyone drive it. This makes me happy to see him so busy enjoying himself. Thank you for a wonderful buy.
customer_reviews.author: frenchie

customer_reviews.title: The controller which comes with the device is made of poor quality. The trigger came out of the socket ...
customer_reviews.text: So, I am giving the car only star because of the following reason. The controller which comes with the device is made of poor quality. The trigger came out of the socket and the car stopped responding to the controller. Sadly due to the car not responding it decided to travel down the street directly into a drain pipe. Though the car is extremely fast the controller is extremely cheap and connection continues to drop.
customer_reviews.author: Cybertek

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: HOSIM RC Truck 9123, 1/12 Scale Radio Controlled Electric Fast Racing Car - High Speed 38km/h Offroad 2.4Ghz 2WD Radio Controlled Monster Truck Truggy - Best Gift for All Car Enthusiast (Orange) I bought two cars and gave the 9112 as a gift the 9123 was fast and fun but on the second day the lower swing arm broke at the ball joints and one of the rear shocks broke, Update: was contacted by Hosim and they corrected the situation.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Patton

customer_reviews.title: Bummed!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two RC trucks for our boys (5 & 7). Unfortunately, I have to return one as a part broke off immediately but more bothersome is that is does NOT go into reverse. We were really looking forward to this item being we are experiencing great weather for Michigan and thought what better gift for the boys to do outside, periodically. Bummed we are returning one and appears to be out of stock... Love the “working” one!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprise Speed snd Power
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with the speed of this RC car on the pavement and on the grass. The charge will only last about 10 minutes, but it's a blast. The only big flaw is the quality of the pins and t-bar that hold the plastic body on. I have broken both plastic t-bars on single flips. The car easily flips which means you will break the weak support pieces. My pins also feel out and got lost.
customer_reviews.author: J. Castellani

customer_reviews.title: They are fun, but break easily
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought, I had to send back because a I was putting the battery in and the wire came out of the motor chassis. I bought two more because I wanted to drive one with my son. We charged them and took them out and both of them had plastic parts break even when we were driving them pretty conservatively. For $80 a pop I expected more.
customer_reviews.author: JRF

customer_reviews.title: Hate the design, otherwise runs fast...
customer_reviews.text: Charging battery is enormous trouble. You have to take these tiny metal clips on top and remove the top of the car to unplug the battery for recharge. This is freaking annoying as hell. Bad design overall. Garbage...
customer_reviews.author: GAMBLER

customer_reviews.title: Robust vehicle, annoying battery charging process.
customer_reviews.text: Robust vehicle but battery life not too great. That's ok but the most annoying part is charging the battery. You almost have to take apart the whole casing. Did not know that before I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Arun R

customer_reviews.title: Not a good simple car for anyone.
customer_reviews.text: Not for kids. You have to take the top off with small parts every time you want to drive it to turn it on or off. Horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Jami Lester

customer_reviews.title: Issues, but company was quick to resolve and replace
customer_reviews.text: Update --The company was quick to contact us and offer a replacement car free of charge and shipping. So far the car has been used 2-3 times outdoors and held up well, so I'm hoping it continues to do so.Car does great outside this time around. Company did a great job of checking on the product and apologizing for issues. Broke beyond repair after less than 10 minutes of ride time in a flat road. It was the big gift for my son and he is so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: great rc car, battery change sucks
customer_reviews.text: A lot of trouble getting to battery after only 10 minutes of battery life. The performance of this rc car is awesome. It is a great toy but again, it is aggravating to have to unscrew 4 screws after removing the body via 4 pins, and then put it all back for only10 minutes of fun. The extra battery doesn't have time to charge so there is a wait. Even the grandson lost interest quickly due to the hassle of battery charge and change.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome car
customer_reviews.text: Great car, my kids and I have been having a blast with it. It’s more than fast enough, and has stood up to everything we’ve thrown at it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Sprachen

customer_reviews.title: We love it yea
customer_reviews.text: This thing has a massive power and torque my eight-year-old loves it except for the battery dies a little too fast but we’re gonna order another one in. But overall we love it
customer_reviews.author: James P.

customer_reviews.title: Breaks too easy!
customer_reviews.text: Great price however, the slightest crash breaks parts like crazy. Within 30 min run time, steering arm broke. I am sure more parts will break soon. Update: customer service was excellent. Recieved a replacement car immidiately.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Seller is good at addressing issues!
customer_reviews.text: Broke a couple months after buying it....motor stopped working. Don’t buy waste of money!.....REREVIEW....... After troubleshooting the issue with the seller, it was determined I needed a replacement RC. The seller sent me a brand new RC at not cost to me and let me keep my defective RC for parts. Prompt response and understanding with my issues! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little truck!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic toy! My son took it to Death Valley and and tourists seemed more interested in watching his car in the sand dunes than the view! Very sturdy frame and amazing suspension. Body proved a bit hard for my 10 y.o. son to fasten the body on the frame so he ended up using it without the body which made it look a bit like the lunar rover. Great toy with great quality and value!!
customer_reviews.author: Prof.B

customer_reviews.title: This RC works great and my 8yr old son loves it
customer_reviews.text: This RC works great and my 8yr old son loves it!!!! Great solid product that goes FAST!!! Son always has a smile on his face when he's driving it and there's a lot of "did you see that dad!!!". Only downfall is that you have to lift the body and open the battery bay to get to the on/off switch.
customer_reviews.author: DL-311

customer_reviews.title: Nice RC Cars.
customer_reviews.text: These cars are great. Very fun to drive and crazy fast. The battery packs have stopped working in two different occasions. However, I contacted the seller and they sent a replacement battery with no issues. Excellent customer support and very fun RC car for kids and adults.
customer_reviews.author: Technofriendly

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED TO FIVE STARS
customer_reviews.text: The frame on this truck broke the second time my son got it out to play with it. UPDATE: after reading this review, Hosim representatives contacted me and offered to send a new car. We received the new remote control truck promptly and it has worked well so far. My son is 8 and has no problem controlling it. Based on personal experience, the Hosim company takes good care of their customers. We're hoping the truck continues to work- it's a very fun toy!
customer_reviews.author: Alison Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Idk if it's the battery or the car regardless it still sucks.
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice Car. Super fast my kid loves it. Update : Just the nice gesture from customer service of contacting us makes the purchase well worth. Thanks again
customer_reviews.author: berenice castelan

customer_reviews.title: You can count on the commitment of the seller to resolve problems
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun and fast car. While the car may not be as durable as more expensive RCs, The seller is committed to resolve any problem that you may have this product. The gear of my car broke after after 10 usages. I contacted the seller and they replaced the defective car without questions asked. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Rafael G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This RC truck is awesome. It will flat out fly and is very resilient. My 8 and 6 yr old grandsons love them (we bought 2) and they work them pretty hard with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: GI Stork

customer_reviews.title: Great car. Super fast and handles well
customer_reviews.text: Great car. Super fast and handles well. Would of given 5 stars but transmission does not last. Fairly inexpensive to replace but not the easiest of tasks to do
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: It broke the first day of Christmas. My son was so disappointed. But the company worked with me to fix the issue and all is well
customer_reviews.author: Mr Cox

customer_reviews.title: More technical issues than what the car is worth.
customer_reviews.text: This product was a Christmas gift for my kids but before Christmas is here I am getting negative feedback on the Rc cars faulty technical issues that makes me want to return them and I should have because the first time my son drove the car its front wheel came off and the axle broke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After a couple of joy rides we had to spend 15$ on broken parts
customer_reviews.text: This thing sure goes fast but be ready to buy extra parts as they break when the car crashes. After a couple of joy rides we had to spend 15$ on broken parts...
customer_reviews.author: Joao Bras Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson. He absolutely loves it. As did my husband his grandfather. Hours of fun. We did buy the extra battery. Our grandson is 10 and a half and had no troubles working it
customer_reviews.author: Denna

customer_reviews.title: Fast but kind of cheaply built. Had to fix ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast but kind of cheaply built. Had to fix both front lower ball joints after a few weeks of son playing with it. The company made good on it and offered to send me repair parts or give a partial refund. They handeled it very nicely
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome power and speed both on and off road
customer_reviews.text: Awesome power and speed both on and off road. The one down side is the battery goes pretty quick. Maybe 20 minutes of consistent driving. It also gets quite warm on the bottom when running it that long. I am going to look for a back-up battery so my son can run it longer.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Fast car
customer_reviews.text: Great fun car, very fast. Short battery life- I'd recommend getting an additional battery if you want to use it for a period of time. Good customer service if you should have a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Prairiemom

customer_reviews.title: Fast.  Really Fast.
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly fast. It turns so fast it can be hard to control, but it is very sturdy and my son loves it. We are not RC experts, but you can tell this isn't a "toy." We did have an issue early on, but their customer service was very responsive and ended up replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: KGintheD

customer_reviews.title: A few issues, but great customer service for a great toy
customer_reviews.text: My 10-year old loves this car. He can't believe how fast it drives. It did break a few days after he received it (one wheel came unattached when he drove it over a reflector in the street that marked the nearby fire hydrant), but the company has been very responsive and has sent replacement parts to fix it at no charge and quickly. We would give it five stars if it hadn't broken within a week, but when the product works, it's definitely a five-star product. All things considered, it's a great product for the price. My children have had many RC cars and this is their favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: preety good
customer_reviews.text: It was amazing! so fun but when I was running it at a piece of concrete (on accident) the front part broke of so I have to say it is pretty fragile I would buy it again though
customer_reviews.author: Cary Terra

customer_reviews.title: Cool little car
customer_reviews.text: Cool little car, works awesome and my son has really ran this thing. Even in the rain lol. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For speed and precision. 5 Stars. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: For speed and precision. 5 Stars. I have had it for a long long time and it has withstood just about everything. The batteries have both gone out but will order more soon.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: replacement was easy, but was hoping the parts were a little ...
customer_reviews.text: very fast. Bought one for both kids 9 and 11. They can control them very well. As expected they ran them into eachother and broke both bumpers within a couple weeks :(. replacement was easy, but was hoping the parts were a little more affordable. I think i have bought 1/2 car again already after a few crashes.
customer_reviews.author: mendosia10

customer_reviews.title: Almost a five star .....
customer_reviews.text: Just got this new toy and it is a blast but the run time is not long at all before you have to let it cool down and charge the little batteries for 90min ! , Looked for a upgraded battery but the manufacturer doesn't make one .. still fun but short but fast but short but fast but again short run time :(
customer_reviews.author: Dean Ferraro

customer_reviews.title: Cool little truck
customer_reviews.text: Cool little truck. Son loves it. Gears started grinding within a few weeks of purchase but Hosim was quick to respond and send replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Hales Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Extremely fast RC car and excellent value for the price! Durable and great looking. The battery is a snug fit and a pain to remove and re-install but otherwise I would highly recommend this RC car
customer_reviews.author: Javanni LLC

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing product.
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service from the company, but after only 2 weeks the shocks had to be replaced. Another couple weeks after receiving the parts the plastic gears stripped(which was a huge pain to replace, lots of screws had to be removed and they are a couple different sizes). Now less than four months after owning this truck it won't run at all. Both times the company sent me parts, but honestly I did not purchase this for my child to have to keep repairing.
customer_reviews.author: ziggyn42

customer_reviews.title: Great car, great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I love the car. It's fast and fun. I would definitely recommend upgrading the battery to a florian 180mah battery. And changing to tiamya battery connectors so you can use a real hobby charger. The gearbox went and I emailed the company and with very little trouble they sent new gearbox and motor. Email responses were always within a day due to time differences. I would be happy to buy any Hosim product.
customer_reviews.author: B Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toy - Very fast
customer_reviews.text: 8 year old loves it. Was a Christmas gift and still going strong. Case is a little scratched and scuffed other wise still going strong. When buying extra batteries make sure to double check batteries. Originally bought the wrongs one because it was listed as "other customers also bought".
customer_reviews.author: John Niquette

customer_reviews.title: Broke but got another
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandson. He loves it but is broke after 5 mins of use in the living room. Sent it back and got another one. So far so good. I hope it lasts until I visit because I want to play with it too.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: ... toy was a hit with my son but I recommend getting the protection plan because the plastic pieces for ...
customer_reviews.text: This toy was a hit with my son but I recommend getting the protection plan because the plastic pieces for suspension broke the first day. Also, it’s wise to get an extra battery.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun! Very tough!
customer_reviews.text: Great fun and quality for a beginning hobbyist. Good build quality and looks to be easily repairable. Very tough and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: 10 yr old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old son got this for xmas and he loves it! Only one complaint the battery life is short. And you have to take all apart to charge it. But ohter then that he loves it and even had it out in the snow the other day
customer_reviews.author: N King

customer_reviews.title: Truck
customer_reviews.text: Breaks very easily, have had to replace parts pretty often.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Reola

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas. But we live in Michigan so he hasn’t used it a whole lot up until about 2 months ago. At first this car was great but since he’s been using it one of the brackets broke. Then the gears striped and now it won’t even work. I would probably buy a better remote control car next time.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Family

customer_reviews.title: A really fast Rc car for starters.
customer_reviews.text: This car is extraordinarily fast, the car comes in with a sick looking package and the battery comes charged . The car hitts almost 30 mph and lasts about 7-10 minutes at full speed. The car's battery is its only drawback.I recommend you to buy another battery for the car so you can play longer. The fun never stops as you can go extremely fast and is very responsive to the controls. Also is you come across any problems , the warranty comes really handy and they take the matter into their own hands and make sure you are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi kasibhatla

customer_reviews.title: very nice......
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. I enjoy it too. It's perfect for a pre teen young teenager. It's constructed for a young child. Sturdy durable top quality. Adults who are just starting RC cars this isn't a bad start. It's not for the person who is into RC cars because upgrades really aren't feasible. Example the battery nor the gears can be upgraded. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: this car runs great..
customer_reviews.text: this car runs great...but the battery only lasts 10 minutes after waiting about 3 hours for it to charge..very disappointing so now I have to buy an extra battery cause just when you're have fun the battery dies
customer_reviews.author: Trésor

customer_reviews.title: Super Fragile, takes away the fun!
customer_reviews.text: I anticipated this car to brake quick because the fragile materials were used to bild it, but how soon it happened was ridiculous. For close to $100, I only used it twice. Sincerely did not abuse it, and it's now broken in pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My child loves it !!!
customer_reviews.text: My child loves this remote control, plays with it until it has to be recharged. I need to buy another one so I can play too.
customer_reviews.author: Nailzun

customer_reviews.title: Good car, bad batteries
customer_reviews.text: One year later the battery is overheating when charging. One of the 3 batteries is already dead (near 2V). For the price of the car i would expect the batteries to last longer. I barely got to use it about 2x every other month.
customer_reviews.author: Marcio E Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my grandson a few years ago and it's still running.
customer_reviews.author: Sinia Isabel McDonald

customer_reviews.title: My son loved the truck
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the truck, the only problem is that the bumpers are sensitive, I ran into a pole several times and my bumpers broke. I also ordered extra batteries to have some extra play time. I’m cosidering buying one for myself .
customer_reviews.author: Esteban

customer_reviews.title: How do I get a hold of this company??
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this RC car but after less than 10 recharges the battery shorted out and smoked when he plugged it back in. Now the car is dead. Too much money for only 10 times he got to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Service made it right!
customer_reviews.text: after some problems with a car which was less than a week old and initial refusal to honor the warranty as I didn't purchase the RC from one of their dealers, their service rep made it right by sending another car for free! This is a fun, fast car which my son loves to drive! Upping my rating from 1star to a 4 as 2 batteries didn't last more than a week.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Car is awesome and works really well
customer_reviews.text: Car is awesome and works really well. I give it three stars only because it shipped with a bad battery. I replaced the battery and haven't had any problems. Updating my post. The manufacture reached out to me based on my three star rating and offered a refund or a new battery. The sent me a new battery in a timely manner and I am 100% satisfied. Great customer service that I didn't even ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

product_meta.title: Hosim All Terrain RC Car 9112, 38km/h 1/12 Scale Radio Controlled Electric Car - Offroad 2.4Ghz 2WD Remote Control Truck - Best Christmas Gift for Kids and Adults (Blue)
feature_bullets: 【Powerful & Amazingly Fast】: Thanks to the powerful brush 390 motor largest in class you can break the speed limit up to 38km/h and enjoy the feeling of speed.
【Superior Control Experience】: With a range of up to 260 feet and highly responsive steering and throttle, the ergonomic transmitter of the radio remote control car ensures superior control.
【High Performance & Off-Road】: 2.4Ghz radio system, S-Truck suspension technology, great off-road performance, strong and durable,perfect for specialized operation, like turn, drift, and flip.

【All Terrain RC Car】: Has no problem going through the sand, grass,wet mud and marshy land, easy to finish and enjoy lots of difficult movement. With the semi-waterproof feature, allowing for play in any weather. Great gift for experienced RC enthusiasts or kids!
【Reliable After Sale Service】: 30-Day Money Back Guarantee 90 days Replacement Warranty and Ready to respond within 24 hours.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars797 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
